arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Parma: Serie A returns
arts.sum: After Italy’s wins over Estonia and Israel, Serie A resumes at the Unipol Domus where Fabio Pisacane’s Cagliari take on Carlos Cuesta’s Parma, with both teams sitting on one point after two matches. Leonardo Pavoletti has scored five career goals against Parma, four of them for Cagliari; among the current Serie A Enilive clubs, it is the team he has scored against most, alongside Sassuolo.
LiveScore provides picks for all 10 weekend games as Inter face Juventus.

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs Parma - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Parma, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
